name: Wipe - Toilet Plague
description:
What do you do if you're in Quarantine? WIPE: Toilet Plague of course!!

We (Mystive Studios) have set up a Two-Week Challenge (internal game jam) to create a project. No more, no less. And that's where WIPE came out. Humorous, funny, multiplayer shooter about coronavirus, quarantine and urge to grab as much toilet paper as possible.
It was a fun journey, allowing us to gather inspiration by doing something entirely different. These two-weeks internal Game Jam renewed and motivated us to get back to our main 5 year project - Alan Sharp.
Wipe: Toilet Plague is a free, fun project and any donation will be of great help to us in working on our projects.

Wipe: Toilet Plague is playable via Steam Account. You need to have steam open in order to connect with your friends.

#StaySafe #Havefun
